22ec2348-70a0-4bec-95a8-d2c8901da047.description: Recipients of this certificate have demonstrated advanced knowledge and practical experience of blockchain technology and cyber security. Holders are able to show comprehensive understanding of blockchain-backed cybersecurity, articulate complex blockchain security concepts, including immutability and distributed consensus, to a wider audience, analyze decentralized storage solutions, and lead business exploration into emerging solutions in relation to blockchain and cybersecurity.
22ec2348-70a0-4bec-95a8-d2c8901da047.name: Cybersecurity - Blockchain Applications 1

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 8-hour topic modules, including:  Cybersecurity and the Blockchain, Decentralized Processing/Storage, Ledger Immutability, Distributed Consensus, Verifiable Broadcasts, Trustless Coordination and Transparent Processing
Completed one hands-on lab module using the Eth.Build tool to teach the basics behind asymmetric encryption and hash functions with respect to cybersecurity.

Completed questionnaire assessments for the following modules:  Cybersecurity and the Blockchain, Decentralized Processing/Storage, Ledger Immutability, Distributed Consensus, Verifiable Broadcasts, Trustless Coordination and Transparent Processing
